Table.sql: SELECT a.MABN, a.HOTEN,substr(i.tuoivao,1,3)||decode(substr(i.tuoivao,4,1),0,'TU',decode(substr(i.tuoivao,4,1),1,'TH',decode(substr(i.tuoivao,4,1),2,'NG','GI'))) tuoi, nvl(h.quanhe,' ') quanhe,nvl(h.hoten,' ') hotenqh,nvl(a.SONHA,' ') sonha, nvl(a.THON,' ') thon,b.TENPXA, c.TENQUAN, d.TENTT, to_char(f.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi') ngayvk,g.CHANDOAN, g.MAICD, e.TENKP, to_char(g.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi') ngayrk,g.SOLUUTRU,to_date(g.ngay,'dd/mm/yy hh24:mi')-to_date(f.ngay,'dd/mm/yy hh24:mi') as ngaygio,f.maql FROM his.btdbn a inner join his.benhandt f on a.mabn=f.mabn inner join his.btdpxa b on a.maphuongxa=b.maphuongxa inner join his.btdquan c on a.maqu=c.maqu inner join his.btdtt d on a.matt=d.matt left join his.xuatvien g on f.maql=g.maql inner join his.btdkp_bv e on f.makp=e.makp left join his.QUANHE h on f.maql=h.maql inner join his.lienhe i on f.maql=i.maql WHERE f.LOAIBA=1 and g.ttlucrv in (7,9,10,11)

SELECT a.MABN, a.HOTEN,substr(i.tuoivao,1,3)||decode(substr(i.tuoivao,4,1),0,'TU',decode(substr(i.tuoivao,4,1),1,'TH',decode(substr(i.tuoivao,4,1),2,'NG','GI'))) tuoi,nvl(h.quanhe,' ') quanhe,nvl(h.hoten,' ') hotenqh,nvl(a.SONHA,' ') sonha, nvl(a.THON,' ') thon,b.TENPXA, c.TENQUAN, d.TENTT,to_char(g.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi') ngayvk,g.CHANDOANrv, g.MAICDrv, e.TENKP, to_char(g.ngayrv,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi') ngayrk,g.SOLUUTRU,to_date(g.ngayrv,'dd/mm/yy hh24:mi')-to_date(g.ngay,'dd/mm/yy hh24:mi') as ngaygio,g.maql FROM his.btdbn a inner join his.benhanngtr g on a.mabn=g.mabn inner join his.btdpxa b on a.maphuongxa=b.maphuongxa inner join his.btdquan c on a.maqu=c.maqu inner join his.btdtt d on a.matt=d.matt inner join his.btdkp_bv e on g.makp=e.makp left join his.QUANHE h on g.maql=h.maql inner join his.lienhe i on g.maql=i.maql WHERE g.ttlucrv in (7,9,10,11)

Table.sql1: SELECT a.MABN, a.HOTEN,substr(i.tuoivao,1,3)||decode(substr(i.tuoivao,4,1),0,'TU',decode(substr(i.tuoivao,4,1),1,'TH',decode(substr(i.tuoivao,4,1),2,'NG','GI'))) tuoi,nvl(h.quanhe,' ') quanhe,nvl(h.hoten,' ') hotenqh,nvl(a.SONHA,' ') sonha, nvl(a.THON,' ') thon,b.TENPXA, c.TENQUAN, d.TENTT,to_char(g.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi') ngayvk,g.CHANDOANrv chandoan, g.MAICDrv maicd, e.TENKP, to_char(g.ngayrv,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi') ngayrk,g.SOLUUTRU,to_date(g.ngayrv,'dd/mm/yy hh24:mi')-to_date(g.ngay,'dd/mm/yy hh24:mi') as ngaygio,g.maql FROM his.btdbn a inner join hismmyy.benhancc g on a.mabn=g.mabn inner join his.btdpxa b on a.maphuongxa=b.maphuongxa inner join his.btdquan c on a.maqu=c.maqu inner join his.btdtt d on a.matt=d.matt inner join his.btdkp_bv e on g.makp=e.makp left join his.QUANHE h on g.maql=h.maql inner join hismmyy.lienhe i on g.maql=i.maql WHERE g.ttlucrv=7

SELECT a.MABN, a.HOTEN,substr(i.tuoivao,1,3)||decode(substr(i.tuoivao,4,1),0,'TU',decode(substr(i.tuoivao,4,1),1,'TH',decode(substr(i.tuoivao,4,1),2,'NG','GI'))) tuoi, nvl(h.quanhe,' ') quanhe,nvl(h.hoten,' ') hotenqh,nvl(a.SONHA,' ') sonha, nvl(a.THON,' ') thon,b.TENPXA, c.TENQUAN, d.TENTT, to_char(g.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi') ngayvk,g.CHANDOAN, g.MAICD, e.TENKP, to_char(g.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi') ngayrk,g.sovaovien as SOLUUTRU,to_date(g.ngay,'dd/mm/yy hh24:mi')-to_date(g.ngay,'dd/mm/yy hh24:mi') as ngaygio,g.maql FROM his.btdbn a inner join hismmyy.benhanpk g on a.mabn=g.mabn inner join his.btdpxa b on a.maphuongxa=b.maphuongxa inner join his.btdquan c on a.maqu=c.maqu inner join his.btdtt d on a.matt=d.matt inner join his.btdkp_bv e on g.makp=e.makp left join his.QUANHE h on g.maql=h.maql inner join hismmyy.lienhe i on g.maql=i.maql WHERE g.ttlucrv=7
